project.name: C-C674A-WIRE-05-ST03-DT02-DF16-CF14-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C674A-WIRE-05-ST03-DT02-DF16-CF14-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="asdfasdf" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C674A-WIRE-05-ST03-DT02-DF16-CF14-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Read a string from the input. Get the first character of the string, and then search the string for another instance of that first character.If the character does not appear, go into uncontrolled recursion.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="this string has an another t" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C674A-WIRE-05-ST03-DT02-DF16-CF14-01-GOOD-03

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
